title: INTO | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
Sets Snowflake Scripting variables to the values in a row returned by a
SELECT statement. See Setting variables to the results of a SELECT statement for details.
Specifies scalar expressions (e.g. columns in a table specified by the FROM clause).

Snowflake Scripting variables that should be set to the values in the
expressions in the SELECT clause.
The SELECT statement must return a single row.
See Setting variables to the results of a SELECT statement.
